text: the World Health Organization is meeting

outbreak a global health emergency
corona virus has now spread to every

than seven thousand seven hundred people
infected 16 countries outside China are
affected India is the latest to confirm

state Kerala and in the past hour Russia

spread major international sporting
again events are either being moved or
taken out of China the Chinese Football

be played this season while the indoor

year
drastic measures to contain the virus
are continuing to have huge disruption
on people's lives in China
